params.text: Labarin ƙirar abin hawan Chaku
Chaku yana son wasa da abokanansa.
Ya na son abin hawar Lila.
Nan fa shi ma Chaku ya ga ya kamata ya haɗa na shi abin hawan.
Chaku sai ya bazama neman katakwaye.
Chaku kuma ya tuna cewa fa yana da buƙatar ƙusoshi da guduma.
Sai Chaku ya tafi wajen kawunsa domin neman agaji.
Kawun Chaku ya bashi waɗannan kayan aikin. Saidai kawun nasa ya gargaɗe shi da yayi taka-tsantsan.
Chaku ya yi tunanin yadda zai fara haɗa nasa abin hawan
Chaku kawai sai ya fara aiki.
Kai! wannan keken ya haɗu wallahi, saidai bata kama ƙasa ba.
Lila ta ga ƙokarin Chaku. Sai tayi yunƙurin ta taimaka masa.
Sai suka haɗu su ka samar da nagartacen abin hawa tare.
Chaku shi ke tuƙa abin hawansa duk inda zai je.
A yanzu dai shi da Lila suke yawo tare, kowa da abin hawansa.

“Labarin ƙirar abin hawan Chaku” credits
This work, “Labarin ƙirar abin hawan Chaku” is a derivative of Chaku's Cycleis translated byAlisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Some rights reserved.
